short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that fixes a number of issues with ETA, allowing chrome to be used instead of IE.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that fixes most of ETAs problems and allows chrome to be used.

Current items fixed:
-Timeout is increased from one hour to eight hours
-ETAs ShowModalDialog dependence is removed allowing windows to work again
-Personnel and Training Resources pages are reformatted to work again
-Buttons on the Reports page actually work
-Scrolling on the Reports Page works
-Filter button on Personnel page works
-Makes Ops, PendSched, EnterSched, and Student Detail pages refresh after a popup window is closed
-Fixes the New Request button at the top of most pages
-Course Catalog page is visible and links work
-Fixed the rest of the options on the course catalog pages
-New button for extra resource windows on PendSchedRequest page
-Allows viewing of reports from either ERAU campus
-Messages popup is resized and scrollable
-Popup people selection is scrollable
-Student availability automatically entered in comments
-New weather chart on schedule request page
-Resource utilization page can be opened in multiple ways
